statement.text: A target FICO<sup>®</sup> Score 8 of 602 could be met within 6 months with the following actions:

actions.text: Pay down $52 of your total revolving/open account balances of $889 every month for 6 months.
Pay all your bills on time for 6 months.
Stay current on your payments so that your most recent delinquency ages to 10 months.
Do not open any new accounts, so that your average length of established history ages to 6 years, 6 months.
Do not apply for any new credit.
